schema:creator: Gibson, Aletheia
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ Over Shelter In Place we occupied our time with doing school from our computers at home. I also used my computer to zoom chat with friends from school and also my soccer team. Time on the comfy couch connecting online is the memory from Shelter in Place that I painted in Acrylics.  
 __Participant age:__ 11  
 __Category:__  Kids Age 9-11 (drawings/paintings only)
schema:name: Home Study
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
